t: The Martha Stewart Brand Launches ‘The World Of Martha’ In Amazon Stores - US Press Center
s: February 15, 2023 - SEATTLE—Today, Amazon and the Martha Stewart brand launch “The World of Martha” in Amazon stores, providing customers with a comprehensive, immersive shopping experience in a dedicated brand store.

t: "The World of Martha" in Amazon Stores - The Martha Stewart Blog
s: February 16, 2023 - I am so excited to share our latest news - you can now visit "The World of Martha” in Amazon stores! "The World of Martha" offers all the essentials I love and can’t live without - beautiful products for every room of the home, all in a dedicated brand store.
